statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerSegments WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM CustomerSegments WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, age, purchase_history FROM CustomerSegments ORDER BY age ASC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegments WHERE engagement_level = 'High' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, location, engagement_level FROM CustomerSegments WHERE age < 40 AND purchase_history IS NOT NULL ORDER BY location, engagement_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegments WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, location, purchase_history FROM CustomerSegments WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, location FROM CustomerSegments WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegments WHERE engagement_level = 'High' AND location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM CustomerSegments WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, gender, location FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM Customers INNER JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customers.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, amount FROM Customers JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customers.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM Customers WHERE location IN ('Los Angeles', 'San Francisco', 'Seattle') ORDER BY location ASC, customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, age FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, location FROM Customers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT customer_id, level FROM EngagementLevels WHERE channel = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, location FROM Customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, level FROM EngagementLevels WHERE channel = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, city FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, product_name FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_score, last_engagement_date FROM EngagementLevels WHERE engagement_score >= 80 ORDER BY last_engagement_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_customer_segment, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, city, country FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_budget FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, age, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT c.name, p.purchase_date, p.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchase_history p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY p.total_amount DESC;
SELECT d.city, d.state, d.country, AVG(d.income) AS avg_income FROM demographics d GROUP BY d.city, d.state, d.country;

SELECT m.campaign_name, m.start_date, m.end_date, m.total_budget, e.email_open_rate, e.click_through_rate, e.conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns m JOIN engagement_levels e ON m.campaign_id = e.customer_id ORDER BY m.total_budget DESC;
